message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  What do you think?
I'm not afraid to take a risk. I propose a 70/30 split in my favor. Will you take it?
Let's split this evenly.  I'm willing to compromise after your last offer.  50/50 seems fair, especially considering the inflation we're facing.
You're willing to compromise, but I'm not. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm still the one taking the risk. Will you take it?
